attributes.action: Radically overall the Council Tax system to make it fair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Council Tax is becoming unaffordable for low paid workers. By April 2006, average Council Tax bills will have increased by 70% since 1997.

We would call on the government to radically overall the tax system to make it fair and be based on peoples abilty to pay.  People pay taxes, not property.
